name: Plant Monsters: The Seedquel
description:
Congratulations! You've been hired by Plant Co. as a Monster Gardener. 

Grow plant-based monsters  in a text-based gardening game. This game is a sequel to Plant Monsters which I made a while back but this time around there are new monsters and new features which make game-play fun and engaging. Monsters are randomly created by splicing real mythological creatures from all corners of the earth and plants with over 2500 combinations you could be the first to find a Monster. 

Many People can get a job at Plant Co. but do you have what it takes to become a star in the companies ranks. Find out in Plant Monsters: The Seedquel. 

If anyone would like to make art of a specific monster I would love to see it!
